name: Nancy Drew Dossier: Resorting to Danger
name_original: Nancy Drew Dossier: Resorting to Danger
description:
Nancy Drew Dossier: Resorting to Danger is a game developed by HeR Interactive. It came out on 25-08-2009. It was published by HeR Interactive. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Nancy Drew Dossier: Resorting to Danger on PC.
